metadata.title: CVE-2017-0591 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in libavc in Mediaserver could enablean attacker using a specially crafted file to cause memory corruptionduring media file and data processing. This issue is rated as Critical dueto the possibility of remote code execution within the context of theMediaserver process. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1,7.1.2. Android ID: A-34097672.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
